title: Justice Sonia Sotomayor | Trump's Incompetence and Corruption on Display as Hurricane Nears: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump’s very dumb comments about Hurricane Dorian.

Then, he talks to Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor.
